# Google Font to SVG Path Converter

> One-stop solution for converting Google Fonts to high-quality SVG vector paths, supporting multiple font variants, export formats, perfect for web design, logos, and laser cutting.

## Core Features
- [Google Font to SVG Path](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Convert Google Fonts to SVG vector paths in real-time
- [Logo Font Collection](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Curated Google Fonts perfect for logo design
- [Text Font Collection](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Recommended fonts for web and print

## Export Options
- [SVG Code Export](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：One-click copy SVG/TSX code
- [DXF File Download](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Export DXF for laser cutting and CNC
- [External Tools](https://nexus.skin/)：AI Navigation Hub

## Latest Updates
- [TSX Component Export](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Updated April 2024
- [DXF Download Optimization](https://text-to-svg.tool.tokyo/)：Updated April 2024
